about_us_section.title: SPECIALISTS IN TANTRIC MASSAGE MALLORCA
about_us_section.p1: At Tantric Luxe, we are pioneers of tantric massage in Palma de Mallorca. Our specialized center combines ancestral tantric massage techniques with the luxury and privacy you deserve in the heart of Mallorca.
about_us_section.p2: Each tantric massage session in Mallorca is designed to awaken your senses and connect you with your inner energy. We use premium essential oils and traditional Palma tantric massage techniques for a unique transformative experience.

contact_section.title: BOOK YOUR TANTRIC MASSAGE IN MALLORCA
contact_section.privacy_text: At our Tantric Massage Palma center, we value your privacy. We maintain absolute confidentiality in every Tantric Massage Mallorca session. We do not share personal information and guarantee total discretion in your tantric experience.

servicesPage.title: EROTIC SERVICES
servicesPage.subtitle: EXCLUSIVITY AND PRIVACY
servicesPage.description: Discover our complete catalog of services designed to awaken all your senses and offer you transformative experiences in an environment of maximum luxury.

services.title: EXOTIC PARADISE & FANTASY
services.description: Let yourself be carried away to a world where anything is possible. Every detail is tailored to your most intimate desires and fantasies. Your pleasure has no limits in your own Fantasy Paradise.
services.fullDescription: In this exclusive massage, every detail is tailored to your most intimate desires and fantasies. If you dream of a different caress, a provocative costume, a dominant gaze, or even an experience with accessories (like blindfolds, handcuffs, shackles, soft whips, harnesses, costumes, and much more), this is your space. Here, your fantasy is the protagonist. You just have to tell us what ignites your senses... and we will make it a reality.

services.title: PREMIUM SENSUAL 4-HANDS
services.description: Exclusive striptease show with sensual pole dance. Shared erotic shower and professional four-hands erotic tantric massage.
services.fullDescription: A unique experience that includes an exclusive striptease show, sensual pole dance, a shared erotic shower with both masseuses, a professional four-hands erotic tantric massage, and moments of complicity and play on the divan. The masseuses wear fine and exclusive lingerie, chosen just for you. A session created at your pace and to your desire.

services.title: TANTRIC DELUXE
services.description: Shared erotic shower with your masseuse. Sensual body-to-body massage, front and back, with professional erotic techniques.
services.fullDescription: In your Tantric Deluxe experience, you will enjoy a shared erotic shower with your masseuse, a sensual body-to-body massage front and back, professional and seductive erotic techniques, and a double manual release (guaranteed double pleasure). The room is set with rose petals, candles, and delicate aromas. Includes a glass of champagne, wine, or beer to accompany the moment.

services.title: COUPLE'S TANTRA HARMONY
services.description: An intimate ritual designed to reconnect with your partner and awaken desire together. One or two masseuses will guide you in this shared experience.
services.fullDescription: An intimate ritual designed to reconnect with your partner and awaken desire together. One or two masseuses will guide you in a sensual body-to-body massage, where both of you will actively participate with caresses, touches, and shared games, recovering lost complicity. The session includes a hot candle wax massage on the body, a romantic atmosphere with candles and petals, and a bottle of champagne to toast as pleasure flows between you. The finale will be the most anticipated moment: a manual release for both, sealing the experience in total harmony.

services.title: YACHT MASSAGE EXPERIENCE
services.description: Immerse yourself in a luxury tantric experience designed especially for you, aboard your private yacht. A deep connection between body and desire.
services.fullDescription: Immerse yourself in a luxury tantric experience designed especially for you, aboard your private yacht. We take care of every detail: enveloping aromas, sensual music, warm oils, and an ambiance that transforms your vessel into a floating oasis of pleasure. This massage is more than a session: it is a deep connection between body and desire, guided by expert hands in an intimate and exclusive environment. Ideal for those looking to disconnect from the world and surrender to the art of pleasure with total privacy, between the sway of the sea and the magic of touch.

packages.title: DISCOUNT FOR LOYAL CLIENTS
packages.description: Loyalty deserves a reward. If you've enjoyed our massages before, this Thursday get a ‚Ç¨20 discount on your massage session. A special way to thank you for your trust and loyalty.

packages.title: SHARED PLEASURE
packages.description: Every Saturday, come with a friend... If you share the moment with a friend, you both will enjoy a 10% discount on your experience. Because pleasure... is better enjoyed together.

packages.title: SUNDAYS FOR SINNING
packages.description: Choose a four-hands massage at an exclusive price. More hands... more pleasure. An intensified experience that multiplies sensations and ecstasy. Perfect for those seeking a deeper and more enveloping experience.

faqs.question: What do the services include?
faqs.answer: All our services include a personalized consultation, climate-controlled environment, ambient music, premium oils, and hot towels. Premium services include additional amenities such as champagne, private jacuzzi, and other specified luxuries.

faqs.question: How can I make a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can book via WhatsApp, our online form, or by calling directly. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance. For premium services, a 48-hour advance reservation is required.

faqs.question: What privacy measures do you have?
faqs.answer: We guarantee absolute discretion and privacy. Our facilities have private entrances, we do not share client information, and all our staff sign confidentiality agreements.

aboutPage.title: OUR STORY
aboutPage.subtitle: LUXURY TANTRIC SPA
aboutPage.description: Since 2019, we have been pioneers in creating luxury tantric experiences that transform lives and elevate consciousness in the heart of Mallorca.
aboutPage.story_title: A SANCTUARY OF LUXURY AND SENSUALITY
aboutPage.story_p1: At Tantric Luxe Mallorca, we have created more than a spa; we have developed a sanctuary where the ancestral art of tantra meets the most refined contemporary luxury. Our vision is to provide a sacred space where our guests can explore, heal, and transform.
aboutPage.story_p2: Every detail of our facilities has been meticulously designed to create an atmosphere that awakens all the senses. From essential oils imported directly from their places of origin to ambient music composed specifically for each type of experience.
aboutPage.story_p3: Our team is composed of highly trained and internationally certified professionals, committed to maintaining the highest standards of excellence, privacy, and respect in every interaction.

milestones.title: FOUNDATION
milestones.description: Tantric Luxe Mallorca opens its doors as the first luxury tantric spa in Palma.

milestones.title: EXPANSION
milestones.description: Expansion of facilities with new VIP suites and private jacuzzis.

milestones.title: RECOGNITION
milestones.description: Award for the best alternative wellness spa in the Balearic Islands.

milestones.title: CERTIFICATION
milestones.description: International certification in traditional tantric practices and wellness therapies.

milestones.title: INNOVATION
milestones.description: Introduction of advanced technology for immersive and personalized experiences.

milestones.title: EXCELLENCE
milestones.description: Over 5000 satisfied clients and recognition as a benchmark in wellness tourism.

aboutPage.philosophy_quote: Tantra is not just a practice; it is a path to deep self-understanding and authentic connection with others. In every experience we create, we honor this ancestral wisdom while embracing the beauty of the present moment.

philosophy_points.title: AUTHENTIC CONNECTION
philosophy_points.text: We facilitate genuine encounters with yourself and others, free from judgment and full of acceptance.

philosophy_points.title: HOLISTIC HEALING
philosophy_points.text: We believe in the healing power of conscious touch and mindful presence to restore balance.

philosophy_points.title: CONSCIOUS TRANSFORMATION
philosophy_points.text: Each experience is designed to catalyze positive and lasting changes in your life.
